Cluster Memory Usage:

{%=V.setPercentBar(memoryUtilization)%}
{%=memoryUtilization%}% Utilized ({%=V.formatQuantity(memoryFree)%} Free)
What's this? The amount of physical memory your cluster has, and how much has been used as reported by the operating system.

Total Cache Size:

{%=V.setPercentBar(mcdItemUtilization)%}
{%=V.formatQuantity(bucketsSizeTotal*1024*1024)%} Across {%=h(V.count(bucketsCount, 'bucket'))%}.
What's this? Total cache size across all nodes of the cluster.

Port Configuration What's this? The standard port for memcached is 11211 and the standard port for the proxy is 11212. You can change port numbers here to meet the specific needs of your environment.

Join a Cluster

Attention - {%= h(e) %}

Cluster What's this? A cluster is a group of servers which operate together to provide an elastic data service.
What's this? This is the hostname or IP address of a server node in the cluster that you wish to join.
(Use any server in an existing cluster)
What's this? This is the port number of the Web Console interface and REST services in the cluster.
Security What's this? If you are joining this server node to a cluster that has been secured, you must enter a username and password. These are the username and password of the cluster you are joining, not of your current server node.
CANCEL

Confirm Node Removal

Warning - Removing this node from the cluster will reduce cache capacity across all data buckets. Are you sure you want to remove this node from the cluster?

Configure Server

Step 2 of 3

Could not join the cluster because of bad input.

Would you like to join an existing Membase Cluster?

If this new server will be added to an existing membase cluster you may join that cluster now. To do so, please enter the IP address of an existing cluster member, and the cluster administrator password then select Join Cluster. You can join a cluster later if you prefer, but should do so before storing data on this server. Only servers not already storing data may be joined to a Membase cluster.

Do NOT join a cluster now, maybe later.
Join a cluster now.
Cancel
Could not secure the server because of bad input.

Secure this server

Step 3 of 3

Please enter an Administrator password for this Server. If this is the first server in a Membase cluster, other servers will need, and then they will inherit, this administrator password as they join the cluster.
